What are some essential resources for learning about Verus Coin and getting involved with the community?

If you're new to Verus Coin, there are several essential resources to help you get started. 

**Verus Vision Paper:** 
The Verus Vision Paper is the perfect place to begin learning about Verus Coin. This comprehensive document outlines the vision, goals, and technological foundation of the Verus project.

**Official Site and Community:**
The official Verus Coin website (https://veruscoin.io) and the Verus Discord community (https://discord.gg/VRKMP2S) are excellent resources for learning more about Verus Coin and connecting with the community. The Discord community is very active, welcoming, and full of helpful members who can answer questions and provide guidance.

**Additional Resources:**
There are several blog posts and guides that provide valuable insights into various aspects of Verus Coin. These include articles on the spirit of open source, community, and contributing to crypto, as well as guides on updating or installing the Verus GUI Enhanced Agama Wallet. You can also find information on how Verus solved the "nothing at stake" and weak subjectivity problems associated with Proof of Work, and learn more about the Zcash Sapling upgrade.

**Foundational Information:**
For those who want to dive deeper, there are resources like Ben's Pocket Guide to VerusCoin, which provides an accessible introduction to Verus Coin for both beginners and experienced users. Additionally, the Komodo Ecosystem Spotlight on Verus Coin and the Komodo AMA spotlight on VerusCoin offer more in-depth information on the project.

**Verus Coin Foundation:**
Finally, the formation of the Verus Coin Foundation marks an important milestone in the project's development, with a focus on Public Blockchain as a Service (PBaaS).

By exploring these resources, you'll gain a solid understanding of Verus Coin and its community, and be well on your way to getting involved and contributing to this exciting project.
